structure.unit: ARTICLE VIII. AUTOMATIC TELEPHONE DIALING ALARM SYSTEM

text.section:
Sec. 8A-166. Penalty for violation of article.
Violation of any provision of this article shall be punishable by a fine not to exceed five hundred dollars ($500.00) or imprisonment in the Miami-Dade County Jail for a term not to exceed sixty (60) days, or both such fine and imprisonment.
